name: Eris (MikeMcKnight)
description:
2D Platformer where things are not always as they seem. Touch the orb to reveal platforms that aren't actually there.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button to Shoot.

On Ground:

A/D or Left and Right to move.
Space to jump.

In Water:

WASD or Directional keys to swim.

Programming and Game Design By: Mike McKnight
Sound and Art By: Anna McKnight
